name: BobRTC Dark Theme [Purple/Gold] [Animations]
description:
A cheap and easy theme for the bobrtc community!

This theme is no longer being maintained! Sorry if you are late to the party!

Custom home page wallpaper!
Custom animations to liven up the page!

(note: there will be bugs, this theme isnt not polished)

This Theme is tuned for 1080p monitors anything less or alternate window sizes may corrupt the theme and create visual glitches. 1080p is recommended. I have plans to set the theme to auto adjust.

There will be bugs and incomplete features. Its free what do you expect.
Enjoy
additional_info:
v0.01
-added wallpaper

v0.1
-new wallpaper

v0.2
-color adjustments


v0.3
Whats New:
-New Animations on Phone-book and Dial-er
-New Color updates
-New Caller ID is more visible

Disabled Elements
-Removed top purple bars
-Removed roughness on the edges (cards are less rounded)

v0.4
- Reworked the homepage and finished it
- Slowed animations to prevent lag.
- General updates.
- NEW HOMESCREEN WALLPAPER MADE BY ME!!

HOTFIX:
-Fixed the home screen to accommodate new information

New Update 
v0.5
- Removed PhoneIcon Animations due to increased amount of lag on the client
- Revamped this theme into a Halloween theme soon to be done!

v0.6 HOTFIX:
-Fixed the alert to change cookies banner should be fixed 
-Almost all pages are working on all resolutions now after switching the rem values. (dialer still not working on smaller resolutions)

HOTFIX 8-17-19:
v0.7
-Fixed/Revmoved the alert at the top of the home screen. Preventing it from appearing all-together.
-Smaller Adjustments I haven't pushed yet.
-Adden Glow Around Phone Icons
-Patched Home page again...
-Moved Wallpaper to the top of homescreen.

Version 1.0
-Added Color to search bar
-Added Diverse colors to MyActivity page
-Added Custom Drop-down menu under your name!
-Added Animations
-Added Color Adjustments
-Removed Animations causing lag
-Removed dead code not being used

Bugs:
-Add Number still looks a bit off
-Changing phone categories (hot numbers) menu still broken
-When dialing, Users avatars become warped if their summary is to long
-BoBRTC Icon no aligned properly

V1.1
-Fixed Menu under users name and aligned it better
-Rework of Homepage (colors/animations only)
-Reworked animation code to use less memory/cpu (was causing lag)
-Alerts, Hints, and other messages on the site are still there but invisible.

GUI HOTFIXES
v1.1.2
-Navigation menu revamped and resized
-Changed colors in phonebook
-Changed BobRTC Icon (TopLeft) / Re-Aligned the icon.
-Fixed the menu under HotNumbers
-Fixed the Add Number menu

v1.1.2.1 Hotfix/Refinement
-Color Refinement
-Homepage Patched AGAIN
-ALL IMAGES Are now 70% Transparent 
-Dialer/Calling Page Modified
-Animated the bobRTC logo (top left)

This theme is a resource hog now and i didnt plan to keep adding to it. The script is quite lengthy
-Do not use on screens lower than 1400x900 (or there will be graphical glitches)
-Do not use this on a slow or older pc. Ive had my browsers get locked several times due to amount of animations/transparencies.

I am aware of the alerts when new numbers are posted but, that feature is disabled in this theme due to assest/css pointing to the same items ive already disabled. Im working on re-enabling site messages to allow 100% usability.

v1.2
-Re-enabled website alerts (homepage, new number popup)
I will continue to fix the alerts but for now they are back on

hotfix:
-Fixed homepage
-Removed Alert System (aside from Newly added numbers)

Hotfix for the war :)
-you'll see the updates
-you wont believe your eyes
-just install the theme :)
-FIXED ALL ALERTS

v1.3.1
-Fixed font sizes
-optimizations
